column4: Is there any window manager that supports a "system tray"? I don't want to use Gnome, but I want the system tray icons, such as those of wicd, Pidgin, Dropbox,
I xfce has also a systray
Boohbah, I am talking about window manager though, not an entire desktop environment. Something like icewm, fluxbox or something .. I don't want an entire DE
